name: ABC Math Set
description: The ABC Math Set is a fun and educational toy that helps children learn basic math skills through interactive play. It includes colorful number blocks, counting cards, and an activity booklet. Suitable for children aged 3 and above.

name: Word Wizard Language Kit
description: The Word Wizard Language Kit is a comprehensive language learning tool for children. It includes flashcards, word puzzles, and an interactive talking pen. Perfect for enhancing vocabulary and language skills. Recommended for ages 5 and above.

name: Science Explorers Kit
description: The Science Explorers Kit is a hands-on learning experience for young scientists. It contains a variety of experiments and materials to discover the wonders of science. From chemical reactions to simple machines, this kit covers it all. Suitable for ages 8 and above.

name: Counting Caterpillar
description: The Counting Caterpillar is a fun and interactive toy that helps children learn counting and basic math concepts. Each segment of the caterpillar represents a number, and kids can connect them to create their own number sequences. Suitable for ages 2-5.

name: Junior Chemist Lab
description: The Junior Chemist Lab is a beginner's chemistry set that introduces kids to the world of scientific experiments. It includes test tubes, safety goggles, and a variety of chemicals for conducting simple but exciting experiments. Recommended for ages 10 and above with adult supervision.

name: Word Wizard Language Kit
description: The Word Wizard Language Kit is a comprehensive language learning tool for children. It includes flashcards, word puzzles, and an interactive talking pen. Perfect for enhancing vocabulary and language skills. Recommended for ages 5 and above.
